The virtual machine image is based on CernVM, a customized development based on Scientific Linux 6.x, specifically intended for virtualization. There is some documentation on the project at http://cernvm.cern.ch/portal/release_3.3.0.
For CMS a special contextualization script is used to generate a version of the image including settings needed by the experiment software which runs on the open data. This script runs within CernVM and creates an image usable in VirtualBox.
For known issues and limitations see
CMS Virtual Machines - Known Issues and Limitations
Please follow the tutorial on how to use the CMS Virtual Machine
CMS Virtual Machines: How to install
